attributes.action: Reflet the significantly raised cost of living into benefits for disabled/ low income  parents so we can heat our houses and feed our families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of living as risen hugely in the last 6 months, unfortunately we still have the same amount of money coming in to use. So how are we supposed to keep warm and feed our families? People over the age over 65 get a large winter warmth payout. This is good for people who could die from cold but it's still given out even if the person has a comfortable income. This should be means tested so it is able to be given to disabled people and also to people with young children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
